name: Bank Ventura
description:
A 2D roguelike game, where you play as a thief who wants to rob a randomly generated bank.
Inspired by the masterpiece "The Binding of Isaac".
It's just a prototype. Could be expanded into a full game.

There are 3 levels:

- Level 1: easy rooms (2 enemies x room)

- Level 2: medium rooms (3 enemies x room)

- Level 3: hard rooms (4 enemies x room)

CONTROLS

standard movement

lx mouse = shoot

CREDITS

MAIN MUSIC:

Killing Time by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3953-killing-time
